item.title: Application Lifecycle Management (ALM)
item.description: This page provides an overview of using ALM with the Automation Kit. Summary When looking at ALM for Power Platform solutions that include Power Automate Desktop components Review and follow the Streamline low code governance in your organization to leverage in product feature to move solutions between environments. If needed investigate the Microsoft Power Platform Build Tools for Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions for Microsoft Power Platform or Power Platform CLI to integrate and automate your ALM DevOps processes

item.title: Data Packs
item.description: Data Packs are prepackaged set of data that can be optionally installed into your installed Automation Kit to accelerate your usage. Return On Investment Main Solution The Return on Investment (ROI) main solution data pack includes Automation projects, machines and sample Power Automate Desktop telemetry so that you can get hands on with the end to end process. Getting Started To get started with this data pack Install the Creator Kit from App Source or via Learn setup guide

item.title: Power CAT Application Lifecycle Management (ALM)
item.description: The Automation Kit leverages the ALM Accelerator to provide ALM functionality for solutions that include Power Automate Desktop GitHub Deployment Process Similar to the release process used for other Power CAT managed kits the Automation Kit for Power Platform uses the ALM Accelerator to deploy releases to our public GitHub releases. Our internal process has a Power Platform environment for Development, Test and Production. Once we are ready for a release our integrated GitHub Actions package the managed and unmanaged deployment solutions along with release notes automatically for a GitHub Draft release.
